verbs.description: Basketball legend Dennis Rodman [V: did] meet with one of President Trump 's advisers during the Singapore summit despite the White House saying the retired NBC star would play no official role .

[ARG0: Basketball legend Dennis Rodman] did [V: meet] [ARG1: with one of President Trump 's advisers] [ARGM-TMP: during the Singapore summit] [ARGM-ADV: despite the White House saying the retired NBC star would play no official role] .

Basketball legend Dennis Rodman did meet with one of President Trump 's advisers during the Singapore summit despite [ARG0: the White House] [V: saying] [ARG1: the retired NBC star would play no official role] .
Basketball legend Dennis Rodman did meet with one of President Trump 's advisers during the Singapore summit despite the White House saying the retired NBC star [V: would] play no official role .
